headline: Yum Brands in talks to facilitate merger of its two Indian partners, ET reports
summary: Shares of Sapphire Foods rose as much as 10.7% after the report, closing about 4% higher for the day.  Devyani closed 3.5% higher.  Most fast food franchisees across India have been struggling with a slowdown in same-store sales growth and margin expansion, as consumers reeling under high cost of living cut back on dining out and ordering in.

headline: Yum Brands in talks to merge its two Indian franchisees, Economic Times reports
summary: Yum Brands, which owns KFCand Pizza Hut, is in talks to merge its Indian franchiseesDevyani International and Sapphire Foods,the Economic Times reported on Friday, citing people familiarwith the...
